meanings.sent2: Her dress had a blueish tint to it.
meanings.sent3: The blueish paint on the wall made the room feel calm.
meanings.sent4: The blueish waves crashed against the shore gently.
meanings.sent5: The blueish flowers in the garden added a touch of serenity.

meanings.definition: Tending to be blue in hue.
meanings.sent1: The blueish sky signaled a change in the weather.
meanings.sent2: The blueish eyes of the baby were striking.
meanings.sent3: The blueish water in the pool made everyone look like smurfs.
meanings.sent4: The blueish light from the moon illuminated the path ahead.
meanings.sent5: The blueish hue of the mountains at dusk was breathtaking.
